description:
Various RAM APIs for Modding (VRAM)
By Blackwater

VRAM is a set of modding APIs designed to improve the modding experience.
Currently, VRAM supports:
* Adding, unlocking, using skins
* Adding and accessing save flags, and persisting them in your save file

In the future, VRAM is expected to support:
* Adding and using upgrades
* Adding custom animations to existing bots
* Adding new bots

Additional API suggestions are welcome, especially with test mods.
name: VRAM
